name: Impact (itch) (Jonas Mumm) (Jonas Mumm)
description:
Impact is a fast paced competitive 2 player game for you and your favourite coutchbuddy featuring a pumping soundtrack by the generous Kevin Macleod. It all about hitting your opponent with one of your "bullets" shot out once you bump-land your jump, don´t forget to dodge your opponent´s bullets!

The longer a game takes the faster it gets, prepare your reflexes and stay focussed! Whoever scores 10 points first wins the match.

Software used:

Game Maker Studio

Paint.net

BFXR

Magix Music Maker
